# Diagnostic Code Assistant - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A full-stack Diagnostic Code Assistant application for searching and analyzing diagnostic codes (medical ICD codes, error codes, etc.).

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Zod, Lucide React
- **Backend**: Python 3.11+, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Tools**: Docker Compose, Alembic migrations

## Project Status
âœ… Project structure initialized
- Backend and frontend folders created
- Configuration files set up
- Ready for development

## Development Guidelines
- Follow REST API best practices
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Implement proper error handling
- Use async/await patterns
- Follow PEP 8 for Python code
- Use proper type annotations
